short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a serene nightscape with Celestial Twilight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features a breathtaking digital art scene of the night sky, where ethereal blue and purple clouds stretch across the stars above a dark mountain range. The soft glow of sunset on the horizon adds a touch of warmth, creating a captivating balance between night and day. Perfect for those who seek a sense of calm and wonder while browsing.
